segmentosSRT.text: No, Fugui's signature is on each one.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Long'er, is our Xu family home...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: I'd like to borrow money to set up a shop.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Not as long as you've got your hands up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
- The attack hasn't started.
- Let's put them down.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: we've got to make it back alive.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
That wasn't ours.
It was counterrevolutionary timber.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: That guy's word is law? The government?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: You little bastard! I'll break your legs!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
There'll be dumplings
at the canteen tonight...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: with a whole pig stuffed in each one!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Eat your fill, and then we'll continue.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: put your dumplings in hot water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Make sure you make them hot enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Cold dumplings are bad for the tummy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: And that'll turn into a sheep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: The sheep will turn into an ox.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
And there'll be dumplings and meat
every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
- He's already here.
- Tell him to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: how could it be your son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Tell me what else I can do.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: I think you should go, Chief.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
What are you doing, you little wretch?
I'll teach you a lesson!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Don't you see what they are?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: I've found just the man for her.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: He works in a factory in the county seat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: He is the leader of the factory's Red Guards.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Sounds too good. Will he go for Fengxia?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Yes, and run if he has to.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Erxi is good with his hands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
He painted all the Chairman Maos
in our factory!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
- When did you get here?
- A while ago.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
But there were so many people,
I didn't come in.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng came to wish Fengxia well.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: You can't go on avoiding him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
I've often tried to give you money.
You'd never accept it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: It's all in this account. Take it.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: and my heart will be at ease.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: All my debts will have been paid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: Don't go getting any stupid ideas.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: You must bear it, no matter what!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: You can't take that road yourself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: I don't want to live anymore!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text: No, thank you, I've got to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07

segmentosSRT.text:
To show him the heirs
of this new, Red world.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_07
